item.title: The Capacities Of Different Homeless Shelter Sectors
item.description: library(devtools) ## Loading required package: usethis library(decon) library(ggplot2) library(tibble) library(ggthemes) library(RColorBrewer) Abstract This is a statistical analysis of the capacity of homeless shelters in the City of Toronto. This analysis aims to find the different capacities in homeless shelter sectors. This will alow for a better understanding of which sectors have excess capacities and which are struggling to meet the demand. Introduction Homelesness is a serious issue around the country and Toronto is not exempt from that.
